entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -21.6°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -23.7°C
Wind: WNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Blowing snow in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
